Assumptions & LimitationsÂ¶

  • Server-trusted: The server decrypts and re-encrypts all messages (not true E2E).

  • Controlled environment: Assumes low packet loss (LAN).

  • Username authentication: Usernames are entered at startup but not cryptographically verified.

COMPE 560:UDP-based chat application
